title: 自己做了个服务器，但是不到6级咋搞
author: 10and3
txt_content: 宣传贴子都写好了，然后不到6级，怎么办啊

replies.author: Mr.时间之瓶
replies.txt_content: 慢慢氵吧

replies.author: 骨科级大神
replies.txt_content: 加油做任务慢慢升级把

replies.author: T_irpitz
replies.txt_content: 慢慢做任务

replies.author: 深拥v
replies.txt_content:
那你就升6级啊
逻辑不对吗

replies.author: 零素
replies.txt_content: 那就努力水到6级

replies.author: 铅笔沫
replies.txt_content: 等着水到六级吧

replies.author: 熊猫黑小白
replies.txt_content: 加油水帖

replies.author: 曦灬月
replies.txt_content: 那就加油到六级

replies.author: 许灬愿
replies.txt_content: 任务一直做，签到一直签
慢慢做任务升级吧，没有捷径哦

replies.author: 10and3
replies.txt_content: 那就只能慢慢来了呀

replies.author: 10and3
replies.txt_content: 难受

replies.author: 奶瓶simida
replies.txt_content: 慢慢来吧
你可以把写好的都删掉，然后重写一个，写完后再删掉...

replies.author: 10and3
replies.txt_content:
1139365029 发表于 2020-6-12 22:07
你可以把写好的都删掉，然后重写一个，写完后再删掉...
无情，223333

replies.author: 暗月·流光
replies.txt_content: 多在茶馆泡泡awa

replies.author: BiShop9621
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 喵喵人
replies.txt_content: 憋大招 等6级

replies.author: love_siwang1
replies.txt_content: 慢慢升级到6级就可以了 6级要去隔壁服务器板块宣传哦

replies.author: Daleynf
replies.txt_content: 多做任务回复之类的哦

replies.author: 逍__遥
replies.txt_content: 慢慢升级就完了~

replies.author: Forever_Hong
replies.txt_content: 加油啊  祝你早日到达六级

replies.author: wangxiaotong
replies.txt_content: 一点点来我马上六级了

replies.author: 辉灰112
replies.txt_content: 我教你每天登陆，会给你那么1点积分到6级只要几年就够了

replies.author: w1632050253
replies.txt_content: 有个人6天上到6级，你好好反思一下吧

replies.author: WYL0zhu
replies.txt_content: 多多水贴，等6级有了绿宝石再发。或者建议去[ruby=翻译版机翻]技巧版发教程[/ruby]，可以获得绿宝石的。

replies.author: 希望工程
replies.txt_content: 氵是生命之源

replies.author: MC_xiao_fake
replies.txt_content: 加油做任务吧

replies.author: a229596451
replies.txt_content:
这种情况下，我们只会说
水 的 不 够

replies.author: 繁星之梦1.14
replies.txt_content: 那就加油升六级啊

replies.author: hyzgzz
replies.txt_content: 慢慢水到六级

replies.author: -雪糕-
replies.txt_content: 这个没办法的，你只能慢慢氵上六级啊233

replies.author: yege
replies.txt_content: 水贴就行啊，加油升到6级
